If none are available, you may still proceed with the application.

fields.name: thank_you_confirmation
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for applying!﻿

﻿You should be receiving a confirmation email with more details shortly.

screens.description: Welcome screen for the application, displays suggested items to have prepared before starting.
screens.name: Welcome_Screen
screens.label: Welcome Screen

textTemplates.description: Email body text for a discourage email.
textTemplates.name: concept_paper_discourage_email_body_text
textTemplates.text:
Thank you for submitting an application for the EERE Small Business Program! We appreciate your interest and the effort you've invested in the initial application process.


After careful consideration, we regret to inform you that your application does not fully meet the criteria outlined for participation in the program at this time. However, we understand that each application represents a unique perspective, and we encourage you to consider submitting a full application if you believe there are aspects of your proposal that may not have been fully captured in your initial submission. Please be aware that while you are welcome to submit a full application, it is less likely to be accepted based on the initial evaluation.


Thank you again for your interest in the EERE Small Business Program. We wish you the best of luck with your future endeavors and hope to see your continued growth and success.

textTemplates.description: Body text for a concept paper encourage email.
textTemplates.name: concept_paper_encourage_email_body
textTemplates.text:
Thank you for submitting an application for the EERE Small Business Program! We appreciate your interest and the effort you've invested in the initial application process.


After reviewing your submission, we invite you to proceed with a full application to further explore the possibilities of collaboration.


Submitting a full application will allow us to delve deeper into your proposal and better understand how your business goals align with the objectives of the EERE Small Business Program. Please review the detailed criteria outlined on our website to ensure your full application addresses all relevant aspects.


Should you have any questions or require clarification on any aspect of the application process, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. We are here to support you throughout the process.

We look forward to receiving your full application and further exploring the potential of our partnership.

textTemplates.description: List of items applicant should have for concept paper form.
textTemplates.name: concept_paper_welcome_text_required_items
textTemplates.text:
• Concept paper with the following requirements:
    • Contact information for your technical and business points of contact.
    • Names of all your team members
    • Technical description outlining the proposed technology
  • NAICS code of your business
  • Estimated amount of funding

textTemplates.description: Body for a full application confirmation.
textTemplates.name: full_application_email_body
textTemplates.text:
This is a confirmation email to let you know we have received your application.

Our team will look over your application as soon as we can and get back to you with

any follow up and confirmation on our decision soon.


Thank you for your patience.

textTemplates.description: Welcome text for the full application first screen.
textTemplates.name: full_application_welcome_text_required_items
textTemplates.text:
• Technical Volume
  • Project Summary
  • Budget Justification
  • NAICS code of your business
  • Estimated amount of funding

textTemplates.name: proceed_text
textTemplates.text: If you have all of the materials you may proceed to the next step.

textTemplates.description: Welcome text to greet at the start of the application.
textTemplates.name: welcome_text_greeting
textTemplates.text:
Welcome to the Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy (EERE) funding application!

Before you begin, here is a list of materials you should have ready before start:
